name: medialytics
description: Medialytics is a self-hosted media analytics platform that reports on content performance metrics. Itâ€™s designed for creators or media platforms who want to track views, user interactions, and overall engagement.
features: View tracking: Monitor how many times each piece of content has been viewed.
Engagement metrics: Track likes, shares, comments, and other user interactions with content.
Audience analytics: Understand viewer demographics, locations, and device types.
Performance reports: Generate reports showing top-performing content and engagement trends.
Real-time monitoring: See current viewer activity and popular content as it happens.
Custom events: Track specific user actions or milestones within your media platform.
Retention analysis: Measure how long viewers watch videos and where they drop off.
Comparison tools: Compare performance across different content types, categories, or time periods.
Export functionality: Download analytics data in CSV or JSON format for external analysis.
Dashboard visualization: View key metrics through charts, graphs, and summary statistics.
API integration: Connect analytics to your media platform through REST API.
Privacy compliant: Track metrics while respecting user privacy and data protection regulations.
